dn24:1.1.2: anupiyaṃ nāma → anupiyā nāma (bj); anuppiyaṃ nāma (sya-all)
dn24:1.7.1: thūlūsu → bumūsu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ayaṃ → arahaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.7.3: catukkuṇḍiko → catukuṇḍiko (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); catukoṇḍiko (cck, csp1ed); catukkoṇḍiko (sya1ed, sya2ed)
dn24:1.7.8: moghapurisa, samaṇo sakyaputtiyo → moghapurisa sakyaputtiyo (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.7.19: kālakañcikā → kālakañjikā (bj, sya-all); kālakañjā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | Kālaṅkato → kālakato (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.13.17: yasā nihīno → yasā nikiṇṇo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | ayaṃ → arahaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.19.1: Atha khvāhaṃ → atha kho svāhaṃ (sya-all); atha kho’ haṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.19.16: parisā mahā hoti → parisā hoti (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:1.22.5: parābhūtarūpo, bho → parābhūtarūpo ayaṃ (bj); parābhūtarūpo bho ayaṃ (sya-all, mr); parābhūtarūpo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:2.3.4: parābhūtarūpo, bho → parābhūtarūpo ayaṃ (sya-all); parābhūtarūpo so (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:2.3.10: āviñcheyyāmāti → āviñjeyyāmāti (sya-all); āvijjheyyāmāti (pts-vp-pli1ed) | varattāhi → yāhi varattāhi (sya-all, mr)
dn24:2.17.2: sajitā → sajjitā (sya-all, km); sañjitā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | seṭṭho → saṭṭhā (bj)
dn24:2.18.16: satiyā sammosā evaṃ → sammosāya te (sya-all, mr); sammosā eva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn24:2.19.16: padūsimhā → padūsayimhā (bj); padosiyimhā (sya-all); padūsimha (pts-vp-pli1ed) | Evaṃ mayaṃ → kilantacittāeva mayaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); kilantacittā (csp1ed)
dn24:2.20.13: tathārūpaṃ cetosamādhiṃ phusati, yathāsamāhite citte taṃ → idaṃ padaṃ brahmajālasutte na dissati. evaṃ (mr)
dn24:2.21.4: pajānātī’ti → sampajānātīti (sya-all); sañjānātīti (pts-vp-pli1ed) | asubhantveva → asubhanteva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
